message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I think would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500 for it. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your interest! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10,500 is just a bit too low for me. How about we split the difference and go with $11,000?  It's still a great price considering the value this product offers.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11,000. How about we meet in the middle at $10,750? That's the best I can do.
